SELECT h.hotel_id hotelId, h.hotel_name hotelName, h.created_dt createdDt, IFNULL(tbhs.sort_rank,1000) sortRank FROM t_baseinfo_hotel h LEFT JOIN t_baseinfo_hotel_sort tbhs ON tbhs.hotel_id = h.hotel_id AND tbhs.org_code = #{companyCode} WHERE h.active = 1
and h.city_code = #{cityCode}
and h.hotel_id = #{hotelId}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_pro_product p, t_pro_sale_status s WHERE p.product_id = s.product_id AND p.hotel_id = h.hotel_id AND s.company_code = #{companyCode} AND p.active = 1 AND s.active = 1 )
AND not EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_pro_product p, t_pro_sale_status s WHERE p.product_id = s.product_id AND p.hotel_id = h.hotel_id AND s.company_code = #{companyCode} AND p.active = 1 AND s.active = 1 )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_pro_product p WHERE p.active = #{offShelveProduct} )
ORDER BY sortRank ASC, hotelId DESC

SELECT a.hotel_id hotelId, a.created_dt createdDt, IFNULL(tbhs.sort_rank,1000) sortRank FROM(SELECT DISTINCT h.hotel_id,h.created_dt FROM t_baseinfo_hotel h, t_baseinfo_room r, t_pro_product p, t_pro_sale_status s, t_org_company_supplier cs, t_org_organization o WHERE h.hotel_id = p.hotel_id AND r.room_id = p.room_id AND h.active = 1 AND p.active = 1 AND s.active = 1 AND p.product_id = s.product_id AND s.company_code = #{companyCode} and cs.company_code = s.company_code and cs.org_id = o.org_id and cs.available_status = 1 and p.supplier_code = o.org_code
AND p.hotel_id = #{hotelId}
AND p.supplier_code = #{supplierCode}
AND p.purchase_type = #{purchaseType}
AND s.b2b_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.b2b_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.b2c_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.b2c_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.ctrip_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.ctrip_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.qunar_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.qunar_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.meituan_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.meituan_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.feizhu_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.feizhu_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.tcyl_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.tcyl_sale_status,0) = 0
) a LEFT JOIN t_baseinfo_hotel_sort tbhs ON tbhs.hotel_id = a.hotel_id AND tbhs.org_code = #{companyCode} ORDER BY sortRank ASC,hotelId DESC

SELECT h.hotel_id hotelId, h.hotel_name hotelName, r.room_id roomId, r.room_name roomName, p.product_id productId, p.product_name productName, p.breakfast_qty breakfastQty, p.bed_types bedTypes, p.currency currency, p.supplier_code supplierCode, o.org_name supplierName, p.purchase_type purchaseType, s.b2b_sale_status b2bSaleStatus, s.b2c_sale_status b2cSaleStatus, s.ctrip_sale_status ctripSaleStatus, s.feizhu_sale_status feizhuSaleStatus, s.meituan_sale_status meituanSaleStatus, s.qunar_sale_status qunarSaleStatus, s.tcyl_sale_status tcylSaleStatus FROM t_baseinfo_hotel h, t_baseinfo_room r, t_pro_product p, t_pro_sale_status s, t_org_company_supplier cs, t_org_organization o WHERE h.hotel_id = p.hotel_id AND r.room_id = p.room_id AND p.active = 1 AND s.active = 1 AND p.supplier_code = o.org_code AND s.product_id = p.product_id AND s.company_code = #{companyCode} AND cs.company_code = s.company_code AND cs.org_id = o.org_id AND cs.available_status = 1 AND p.hotel_id in
#{item}
AND p.supplier_code = #{supplierCode}
AND r.room_id= #{roomId}
AND s.b2b_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.b2b_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.b2c_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.b2c_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.ctrip_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.ctrip_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.qunar_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.qunar_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.meituan_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.meituan_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.feizhu_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.feizhu_sale_status,0) = 0
AND s.tcyl_sale_status = 1
AND ifnull(s.tcyl_sale_status,0) = 0
AND p.purchase_type = #{purchaseType}

SELECT p.product_id productId, p.product_name productName, p.supplier_code supplierCode, p.quota_account_id quotaAccountId, o.org_name supplierName, p.hotel_id hotelId, h.hotel_name hotelName, p.room_id roomId, r.room_name roomName, p.breakfast_qty breakfastQty, p.bed_types bedTypes, p.purchase_type purchaseType, p.remark remark, p.currency currency, p.advance_payment_id advancePaymentId FROM t_pro_product p, t_baseinfo_hotel h, t_baseinfo_room r, t_org_organization o WHERE p.hotel_id = h.hotel_id AND p.room_id = r.room_id AND p.supplier_code = o.org_code AND p.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT tpp.product_id productId, tprice.base_price basePrice, tprice.sale_date saleDate FROM t_pro_product tpp LEFT JOIN t_pro_price tprice ON tprice.product_id = tpp.product_id WHERE tpp.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND tpp.room_id = #{roomId} AND tprice.sale_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND tpp.supplier_code = #{supplierCode}

SELECT p.content content, p.created_dt createdDt, p.created_by createdBy, p.operation_week operationWeek FROM t_pro_log p WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.start_date <= #{saleDate} AND p.end_date >= #{saleDate} ORDER BY p.id DESC
SELECT tocs.company_code companyCode, too.org_code supplierCode FROM t_org_organization too LEFT JOIN t_org_company_supplier tocs ON too.org_id = tocs.org_id WHERE too.org_code = #{supplierCode}
